title: Mailjet: Activación automática
description: Business Automation Workflow uses 1 interconnected nodes to automate business processes. When triggered, it executes a sequence of operations that connect different business systems. Streamlines business operations by automating repetitive tasks. Integra con Mailjet.

title: Set: Activación automática (Workflow avanzado - 7 pasos)
description: Forward Netflix emails to multiple email addresses with GMail and Mailjet. This n8n workflow uses 7 interconnected nodes to automate business processes. When triggered, it executes a sequence of operations.
